name: The Staff of Kazlakhor <dark glow> (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (average in general).
It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence incredibly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives tiny bonus to the spell 'neural internecion'.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
It does magical damage like a god.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
